segments.text: I'd like to buy some perfume for my girlfriend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know what kind of scent she usually wears ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She usually doesn't wear anything but a few drops of Chanel No . 5 . But I'd like to buy her a new Fragrance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , here are some of our most popular perfumes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Personally , I quite like the new perfume from Clinique . It's a subtle flowery scent . What do you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That smells great . I'll take one bottle , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to buy any other cosmetics for your girlfriend ? We have a full range of products from cosmetics to skin cleansers and moisturizers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's OK . She normally just wears a little foundation and some loose powder , and I don't know what shade to buy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about some lipstick ? Every woman needs a nice tube of lipstick .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She doesn't usually wear lipstick . She thinks it makes her nose look too big .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about some mascara ? That will make her eyes look bigger .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thank you . She has big enough eyes as it is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know what she would like-some whitening cream .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No thanks . Western women usually try to make their skin darker , not lighter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That will be all . You've been very helpful , thanks .
segments.speaker: S2
